description.ko: 고요한 마음의 표면을 흔드는 보이지 않는 주파수를 시각화한 형상입니다.
description.en: Visualizing the invisible frequencies that stir the surface of the quiet mind.

prompt: Concentric ripples of vibrating liquid gold and deep cobalt, visualized as 3D waveforms rising from a silent surface. Minimalist yet complex lines reacting to an invisible bass frequency. High-speed liquid simulation, 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytraced reflections, cinematic lighting using #FF4500 and #4169E1, sharp focus on the crest of the waves, and global illumination highlighting the sound-reactive surface.
